A smart toothbrush that uses AI to detect areas of poor oral hygiene and adjust its brushing pattern accordingly. The toothbrush could also track brushing time and provide personalized recommendations for improving oral health.

A toothbrush with a built-in tongue scraper, making it easier to clean the tongue and reduce bad breath. The scraper could be made of a soft, flexible material that is gentle on the tongue but effective at removing bacteria and debris.
A toothbrush that uses sonic technology to provide a more thorough cleaning. The toothbrush could have multiple speed settings and a gentle vibration mode for sensitive teeth and gums.

A toothbrush that incorporates aromatherapy, with a built-in diffuser that releases calming scents during brushing. The toothbrush could also have a built-in timer to help users brush for the full recommended 2 minutes.

A toothbrush that uses 3D printing technology to create a customized brush head for each user. The toothbrush could use a user's dental impression to create a brush head that is tailored to their specific oral needs, providing a more effective and comfortable cleaning experience.
